text: Rising levels of SCC-Ag1 and SCC-Ag2 were seen in patients with recurrence or progressive disease.The rise in SCC-Ag2 was usually more prominent than in SCC-Ag1.However, SCC-Ag2 did not show improved tumour specificity as compared with SCC-Ag1 or total SCC-Ag.
